course_description: Examination of the various stages of the criminal justice process in the United States and the constitutional rights accorded to the criminally accused.
prerequisites: POLS_OX 101 or POLS_OX 101Q or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4266, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: S. Shomade, Status: Open
